title: Throwing Hatchet of Entanglement
contents: text | This hatchet is well-balanced for throwing and has carved vines throughout the handle.  When it is thrown and hits, vines sprout from the axe and the target must make a STR Save (DC 13) or be restrained as if by an Entangle spell.
text | With a command word, the owner can dismiss the spell. Any entangled creatures are freed. The hatchet remains on the ground.
text | Proficiency with a handaxe allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll.

title: Guild Token
contents: subtitle | Light of the Lost Age
